title: Republicans Denounce Inflation, but Few Economists Expect Their Plans to Help
description: Proposed tax and spending cuts by the G.O.P., which is making a push to take back Congress, are unlikely to bring down rapidly rising prices any time soon.
dc:creator: Jim Tankersley and Emily Cochrane
media:description: Republican candidates have offered few concrete plans to relieve price pressures should they win control of Congress.
